code: import{getUserFromLocalStorage}from"../base/OAuth";export var LOGIN="[AUTH] LOGIN";export var LOGOUT="[AUTH] LOGOUT";export var LOAD_USER="[AUTH] LOAD";export function login(user){return{type:LOGIN,user:user};}export function logout(user){return{type:LOGOUT,user:user};}export function loadUser(){return{type:LOAD_USER,user:getUserFromLocalStorage()};}
